GlobalChangeSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USP_GLOBALCHANGE_ADD_NAMEFORMATS_TO_SELECTION ( @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @ASOF as datetime = null, @NUMBERADDED int = 0 output, @NUMBEREDITED int = 0 output, @NUMBERDELETED int = 0 output, @CONSTITUENTSELECTIONID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ) as set nocount off;
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate(); set @NUMBERADDED = 0; set @NUMBEREDITED = 0; set @NUMBERDELETED = 0;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output;
--if @DATEADDED is null --begin --set @DATEADDED = @CURRENTDATE --end
--if @DATECHANGED is null --begin --set @DATECHANGED = @CURRENTDATE --end
begin try -- do the global change operation here, and set @NUMBERADDED, @NUMBEREDITED, and/or @NUMBERDELETED as appropriate
Begin
-- Table to hold selection ids DECLARE @CONSTITUENTSELECTION TABLE (id UNIQUEIDENTIFIER PRIMARY KEY);
INSERT INTO @CONSTITUENTSELECTION SELECT id FROM dbo.Ufn_idsetreader_getresults_guid(@CONSTITUENTSELECTIONID)
--create temp table DECLARE @CONT TABLE (UpdateID uniqueidentifier PRIMARY KEY) DECLARE @CONT_GROUPHOUSEHOLD TABLE (UpdateID uniqueidentifier PRIMARY KEY) DECLARE @CONT_NOPRIMARY TABLE (CONSTITUENTID_HASNAMEFORMATS uniqueidentifier PRIMARY KEY) DECLARE @CONT_NOPRIMARY_GROUPHOUSEHOLD TABLE (CONSTITUENTID_HASNAMEFORMATS uniqueidentifier PRIMARY KEY)
--Populate temp table for individual updates - no name formats insert into @CONT select CON.ID from CONSTITUENT CON inner join @CONSTITUENTSELECTION SelectionResults on SelectionResults.ID = CON.ID left outer join NAMEFORMAT NF ON CON.ID=NF.CONSTITUENTID Where CON.ISORGANIZATION = 0 and CON.ISGROUP = 0 and NF.ID is null --and (CON.DATEADDED >= @DATEADDED or CON.DATECHANGED >= @DATECHANGED) --and CON.ID = '683E7FEE-6B53-4634-9210-C47C3A188C30'
--Populate temp table for group updates - no name formats insert into @CONT_GROUPHOUSEHOLD select CON.ID from CONSTITUENT CON inner join @CONSTITUENTSELECTION SelectionResults on SelectionResults.ID = CON.ID left outer join NAMEFORMAT NF ON CON.ID=NF.CONSTITUENTID Where CON.ISORGANIZATION = 0 and CON.ISGROUP = 1 and NF.ID is null --and (CON.DATEADDED >= @DATEADDED or CON.DATECHANGED >= @DATECHANGED) --and CON.ID = '683E7FEE-6B53-4634-9210-C47C3A188C30'
--DEAL WITH NAME FORMATS WITH NO PRIMARY BEFORE HANDLING NULL NAME FORMATS BECAUSE PRIMARY WILL BE SET WHEN ADDING NAME FORMATS IF NONE EXIST --Populate temp table for individual primary name updates - has name formats but no primary insert into @CONT_NOPRIMARY select CON.ID from CONSTITUENT CON inner join @CONSTITUENTSELECTION SelectionResults on SelectionResults.ID = CON.ID left outer join NAMEFORMAT NF ON CON.ID=NF.CONSTITUENTID Where CON.ISORGANIZATION = 0 and CON.ISGROUP = 0 and NF.ID is not null --and (CON.DATEADDED >= @DATEADDED or CON.DATECHANGED >= @DATECHANGED) --and CON.ID = '683E7FEE-6B53-4634-9210-C47C3A188C30'
insert into @CONT_NOPRIMARY_GROUPHOUSEHOLD select CON.ID from CONSTITUENT CON inner join @CONSTITUENTSELECTION SelectionResults on SelectionResults.ID = CON.ID left outer join NAMEFORMAT NF ON CON.ID=NF.CONSTITUENTID Where CON.ISORGANIZATION = 0 and CON.ISGROUP = 1 and NF.ID is not null --and (CON.DATEADDED >= @DATEADDED or CON.DATECHANGED >= @DATECHANGED) --and CON.ID = '683E7FEE-6B53-4634-9210-C47C3A188C30'
--DEAL WITH NAME FORMATS WITH NO PRIMARY BEFORE HANDLING NULL NAME FORMATS BECAUSE PRIMARY WILL BE SET WHEN ADDING NAME FORMATS IF NONE EXIST declare @I int = 1 select @I_MAX = count(*) from @CONT_NOPRIMARY while @I <= @I_MAX begin select @CID = CONSTITUENTID_HASNAMEFORMATS, from @CONT_NOPRIMARY where PK = @I
begin try select @NUM_OF_PRIMARY_SALUATION = count(*) from nameformats nf where constituentid = @CID
--CHANGE TO PRIMARY SALUTATION UPDATE BASED ON NAMEFORMATTYPECODEID (Look for Salutation Informal, then Salutation Formal, then top 1) if @NUM_OF_PRIMARY_SALUTATION = 0 begin update dbo.NAMEFORMAT set PRIMARYSALUTATION = 1 where ID = ( select top 1 ID from dbo.NAMEFORMAT where CONSTITUENTID = @CID order by DATEADDED desc ) end
--ADD PRIMARY ADDRESSEE UPDATE BASED ON NAMEFORMATTYPECODEID (Look for Addressee Formal, then Salutation Informal, then top 1)
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch end set @I = @I + 1 end --END LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE
--1. update name format: Addressee - Individual - Formal insert into dbo.NAMEFORMAT ( CONSTITUENTID, NAMEFORMATTYPECODEID, NAMEFORMATFUNCTIONID, PRIMARYADDRESSEE, PRIMARYSALUTATION, CUSTOMNAME, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, SITEID ) select CONUPDT.UpdateID, '989CCA8E-716E-4532-9CDD-6B0279726F8C', 'A1FB4FBD-354D-40CB-B551-9B42D9C0EBEC', 1, 0, '', @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, null from @CONT CONUPDT
--2. update name format: Addressee - Individual - Informal insert into dbo.NAMEFORMAT ( CONSTITUENTID, NAMEFORMATTYPECODEID, NAMEFORMATFUNCTIONID, PRIMARYADDRESSEE, PRIMARYSALUTATION, CUSTOMNAME, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, SITEID ) select CONUPDT.UpdateID, 'C7774EBC-9614-459A-9B82-2E42B8C409E3', '7C71DFD1-66AA-4D59-B91F-46B590B58EDA', 0, 0, '', @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, null from @CONT CONUPDT
--3. update name format: Salutation - Individual - Formal insert into dbo.NAMEFORMAT ( CONSTITUENTID, NAMEFORMATTYPECODEID, NAMEFORMATFUNCTIONID, PRIMARYADDRESSEE, PRIMARYSALUTATION, CUSTOMNAME, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, SITEID ) select CONUPDT.UpdateID, '614731A8-2CA9-4E92-B8F5-42A95EB15991', '7C71DFD1-66AA-4D59-B91F-46B590B58EDA', 0, 0, '', @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, null from @CONT CONUPDT
--4. update name format: Salutation - Individual - Informal insert into dbo.NAMEFORMAT ( CONSTITUENTID, NAMEFORMATTYPECODEID, NAMEFORMATFUNCTIONID, PRIMARYADDRESSEE, PRIMARYSALUTATION, CUSTOMNAME, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, SITEID ) select CONUPDT.UpdateID, '86D819F4-057A-46EF-80F7-61384BAA341C', '6DD0F3CF-424E-43B2-B97B-FAED7E71AB17', 0, 1, '', @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, null from @CONT CONUPDT
--5. update name format: Addressee - Joint - Formal insert into dbo.NAMEFORMAT ( CONSTITUENTID, NAMEFORMATTYPECODEID, NAMEFORMATFUNCTIONID, PRIMARYADDRESSEE, PRIMARYSALUTATION, CUSTOMNAME, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, SITEID ) select CONUPDT.UpdateID, 'C81C195B-FBD7-45CE-8CC1-182EDE84EA8A', --'EF942896-116F-415B-9310-AC7438F1410C', 'D36EE4F5-032E-447C-AB64-43579DB73609', 0, 0, '', @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, null from @CONT CONUPDT
--6. update name format: Salutation - Joint - Formal insert into dbo.NAMEFORMAT ( CONSTITUENTID, NAMEFORMATTYPECODEID, NAMEFORMATFUNCTIONID, PRIMARYADDRESSEE, PRIMARYSALUTATION, CUSTOMNAME, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, SITEID ) select CONUPDT.UpdateID, '4CA98660-FD33-4F42-B77B-6F7C8309FCE7', --'D36EE4F5-032E-447C-AB64-43579DB73609', 'EF942896-116F-415B-9310-AC7438F1410C', 0, 0, '', -- MAY NEED FORMATTEDNAME HERE IF WE CHANGE TO SALUTATION-JOINT-INFORMAL and USE CUSTOMNAME AND NO NAMEFORMATID @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, null from @CONT CONUPDT
set @NUMBEREDITED = @@ROWCOUNT;
--7. update name format for groups/households: Addressee - Joint - Formal insert into dbo.NAMEFORMAT ( CONSTITUENTID, NAMEFORMATTYPECODEID, NAMEFORMATFUNCTIONID, PRIMARYADDRESSEE, PRIMARYSALUTATION, CUSTOMNAME, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, SITEID ) select CONUPDT.UpdateID, 'C81C195B-FBD7-45CE-8CC1-182EDE84EA8A', --'EF942896-116F-415B-9310-AC7438F1410C', 'D36EE4F5-032E-447C-AB64-43579DB73609', 1, 0, '', @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, null from @CONT_GROUPHOUSEHOLD CONUPDT
--8. update name format for groups/households: Salutation - Joint - Formal insert into dbo.NAMEFORMAT ( CONSTITUENTID, NAMEFORMATTYPECODEID, NAMEFORMATFUNCTIONID, PRIMARYADDRESSEE, PRIMARYSALUTATION, CUSTOMNAME, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, SITEID ) select CONUPDT.UpdateID, '4CA98660-FD33-4F42-B77B-6F7C8309FCE7', --'D36EE4F5-032E-447C-AB64-43579DB73609', 'EF942896-116F-415B-9310-AC7438F1410C', 0, 1, '', -- MAY NEED FORMATTEDNAME HERE IF WE CHANGE TO SALUTATION-JOINT-INFORMAL and USE CUSTOMNAME AND NO NAMEFORMATID @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, null from @CONT_GROUPHOUSEHOLD CONUPDT
-- NEED TO HANDLE SITUTATION WHERE NAME FORMATS ARE PRESENT BUT NO PRIMARY ADDRESSEE AND/OR SALUTATION
set @NUMBEREDITED = @NUMBEREDITED+@@ROWCOUNT;
end
end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch
